system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Critical database outage affecting all customers.

conversation_history.message: Our entire system is down, and none of our stores can process sales. This is urgent!
We are investigating this issue immediately and will provide updates as soon as possible. Can you confirm if you are seeing any error messages?
Yes, all users are seeing 'Database connection failed' errors on the point-of-sale terminals.
Thank you for confirming. It appears there is an outage affecting the Azure SQL Database. We are working with Microsoft support to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Please keep us updated. This is severely affecting our operations.
The issue has been identified as a failed database failover in Azure. Microsoft has deployed a fix, and we are verifying system functionality now.
Our systems are back online now. Thank you for your help!
You’re welcome! We’ve confirmed the fix is stable and everything should be running normally now. Let us know if you encounter any further issues.

resolution: Database failover issue in Azure SQL was resolved by Microsoft support. All systems verified operational.
root_cause: Unexpected database failover failure in Azure SQL, caused by an issue in the cloud service infrastructure.
